leukapp.apps.individuals.constants module¶

This module contains the individuals app constants. Information that isn’t likely to change and that is used across the individuals app and the leukapp project should be stored here.

Important

DO NOT change any constant unless you know what you are doing.

APP_NAME = 'individuals'¶

Application’s name.

INDIVIDUAL_CREATE_URL = 'individuals:create'¶

Create URL reverse string.

INDIVIDUAL_LIST_URL = 'individuals:list'¶

List URL reverse string.

INDIVIDUAL_CREATE_FIELDS = ('institution', 'species', 'ext_id')¶

Fields required to create a new instance.

INDIVIDUAL_UPDATE_FIELDS = ()¶

Enabled fields to update an existing instance.

INDIVIDUAL_UNIQUE_TOGETHER = ('institution', 'species', 'ext_id')¶

Fields that are required to be unique together.

INSTITUTION = (('MSK', 'MSK'), ('OTHER', 'OTHER'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the institution attribute.

SPECIES = (('HUMAN', 'HUMAN'), ('MOUSE', 'MOUSE'), ('YEAST', 'YEAST'), ('ZEBRAFISH', 'ZEBRAFISH'))¶

List of value, verbose_name pairs for the species attribute.

INDIVIDUAL_CHOICES = {'SPECIES': (('HUMAN', 'HUMAN'), ('MOUSE', 'MOUSE'), ('YEAST', 'YEAST'), ('ZEBRAFISH', 'ZEBRAFISH')), 'INSTITUTION': (('MSK', 'MSK'), ('OTHER', 'OTHER'))}¶

Dictionary including all Individual's choices.

INT_ID_SPECIES = {'ZEBRAFISH': 'Z', 'HUMAN': 'H', 'YEAST': 'Y', 'MOUSE': 'M'}¶

Characters used in the leukid to describe the Individual’s species attribute.

INDIVIDUAL_CREATE_PERMISSIONS = ('individuals.add_individual',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to create a new instance.

INDIVIDUAL_UPDATE_PERMISSIONS = ('individuals.change_individual',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to update an existing instance.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE = 'Looking good'¶

Sucess message.

PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE = " You don't have permission to perform this action, please contact a\n Leukgen Administrator. "¶

Permission denied message.
